TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but instead a massive man-eating virus has taken its place

I wish that I could be the Doctor

Granted. First you have to go to medical school. Then you have to learn a billion other things.

I wish that a massive man-eating virus replaced Curse.

Cant corrupt that one i hate curse.

I wish that SQUAD Did not use curse. LONG LIVE KERBAL SPACE PORT

Granted. Squad sells KSP to Disney.

I wish I could be a Time-Traveller.

Granted. You can change the speed of the entirety of time, but since time is relative, nothing noticeable happens.

I wish for a rebellion.

Granted, just look at Squad's press release today.

I wish they'd come up with a replacement for the old Spaceport site (whoops, looks like that one's already been corrupted!)

Granted. They now use curse as a replacement.

I wish i could curse Curse.

Granted, your computer explodes as Curse fight back

i wish that my laptop had a better battery

Granted, but it way 10 tons. And is a nuclear reactor on the side.

I wish for nuclear fallout.

Granted. Nookulor fission-caused radioactive cobalt is hiding in your attic, and the war police arrest you for being an accomplice.

I wish that bath robes gave the user limitless wisdom.

Granted but you find you are allergic to the fabric.

I wish everyone in the world was vegan and Christians.

Granted, but trying to live your life like that turns everyone into insane, bloodthirsty carnivores.

I wish Squad would incorporate some of the better mods I find myself using in every build.

Granted. As a side effect, scientific breakthrough completely stops and food becomes so boring that the entire humanity starves to death.

Granted. Mods are very well incorporated and the game runs smoothly when the final version is released. The day after that, an asteroid hits Earth and humanity is extinct.

I wish a big, bad barbecue. Brazilian way.

Edited May 7, 2014 by BadLeo

Granted but it is barbecued cat.

I wish for Mars One to succeed which it will anyway.

Granted. Mars One results in the revolt of every crew member. The mob of spacecraft proceed to fire death rays (??!!) at everyone else in space. Also they attack you.

I wish for a Space Revolt.

Granted. Space decides earth's atmosphere shouldn't exist.

I wish for a pie of science.

Granted. It was a test from Glados. To see what happens when humans eat deaDLY NEUROTOXIN PIES! BUAHAHAHAHAHAHAA

I wish that all NPC animations involved the spontaneous generation of:

- Toilets

- Soda cans

- Antimony

Granted, but now there are so many soda can toilet antimonies that the world cracks in half then explodes.

I wish that my computer would be faster

Granted. It runs away.

I wish I didn't have an English essay that I should be working on at this very moment

Granted, it's now a Swahili essay.

I wish people weren't so stupid.

Granted. Now people cause (x+50)50 damage to the environment because they need to win the war against plants.

I wish the plants were defeated by the humans.

Granted. Earth runs out of oxygen and all humans and animals suffocate.

I wish I could travel back in time and kill Hitler.

Granted, but you don't get to know how.

I wish for a pencil.

Granted, but it spontaneously combusts.

I wish for a fire extinguisher

Granted. It stops working, and when you need to use it, it explodes.

I wish my random letter namer wasn't so random.
